text: Dame Margaret Hodge (born 8 September 1944) is the Labour MP for Barking and has been since 1994. She was born in Cairo, Egypt. She went to university at London School of Economics. == References == Category:1944 births Category:UK MPs 1992–1997 Category:UK MPs 1997–2001 Category:UK MPs 2001–2005 Category:UK MPs 2005–2010 Category:UK MPs 2010–2015 Category:UK MPs 2015–2017 Category:UK MPs 2017–2019 Category:UK MPs 2019–2024 Category:Jewish British politicians Category:Politicians from Kent Category:Knights and Dames Commander of the Order of the British Empire Category:Living people Category:Labour Party (UK) MPs
title: Margaret Hodge
